            Jasmine Model
This house and lot offering caters to your growing family.

House Features:

  3 Bedrooms
  1 Master's Toilet and Bath
  1 Common Toilet and Bath
  1 Powder Room
  1 Maid's Room with Toilet and Bath
  Porch and Lanai Area
  Laundry Area
  Carport


Note: Price listed is exclusive of VAT.

Breathe in the Future of Quality Living
Located in an area rich in agriculture, Ameria is grounded in country culture while providing contemporary living within the integrated township of AGRIYA. Ameria came from the name "Alstroemeria", which means a type of flower that symbolizes prosperity.
Ameria is also the first premier subdivision located in Panabo, Davao del Norte and it boasts of generous lot offerings, wide open spaces, encouraging residents to bring farming into their own backyards. In addition, Ameria offers both OPEN LOT and HOUSE & LOT packages - the House and Lot Packages have a total of 7 house models to choose from.

Some of the features of Ameria include:

  Main Entrance and Service Entrance, both with 24-hour security.
  Over 6,000sqm allotted to open parks, playgrounds and community garden patches.
  A central clubhouse with a multi-purpose hall, playground and half-Olympic sized swimming pool.
  Tree-lined paved roads

-15-meter road-right-of-way for the main road
-12-meter road-right-of-way for the secondary roads
-10-meter road-right-of-way for the tertiary roads

  Generous landscaped setback from the main road ensuring privacy for the community.
  Provisions for water cistern to ensure continued supply of water.


Special Features:

  Low Density Community
  3 Sprawling open parks and playgrounds strategically located throughout the community
  Clubhouse
  Landscape Main Entrance


Payment Term:
20% downpayment payable for over 36 months

HLURB LTS No. 34059
Turnover: 2022

Calista Mid

            Jasmine Model (Block 14 Lot 15 - RFO 12/18 months)
This house and lot offering caters to your growing family.

House Features:

  3 Bedrooms
  1 Master's Toilet and Bath
  1 Common Toilet and Bath
  1 Powder Room
  1 Maid's Room with Toilet and Bath
  Porch and Lanai Area
  Laundry Area
  Carport


Note: Price listed is exclusive of VAT.

Breathe in the Future of Quality Living
Located in an area rich in agriculture, Ameria is grounded in country culture while providing contemporary living within the integrated township of AGRIYA. Ameria came from the name "Alstroemeria", which means a type of flower that symbolizes prosperity.
Ameria is also the first premier subdivision located in Panabo, Davao del Norte and it boasts of generous lot offerings, wide open spaces, encouraging residents to bring farming into their own backyards. In addition, Ameria offers both OPEN LOT and HOUSE & LOT packages - the House and Lot Packages have a total of 7 house models to choose from.

Some of the features of Ameria include:

  Main Entrance and Service Entrance, both with 24-hour security.
  Over 6,000sqm allotted to open parks, playgrounds and community garden patches.
  A central clubhouse with a multi-purpose hall, playground and half-Olympic sized swimming pool.
  Tree-lined paved roads

-15-meter road-right-of-way for the main road
-12-meter road-right-of-way for the secondary roads
-10-meter road-right-of-way for the tertiary roads

  Generous landscaped setback from the main road ensuring privacy for the community.
  Provisions for water cistern to ensure continued supply of water.


Special Features:

  Low Density Community
  3 Sprawling open parks and playgrounds strategically located throughout the community
  Clubhouse
  Landscape Main Entrance


Payment Term:
20% downpayment payable for over 36 months

HLURB LTS No. 34059
Turnover: 2022

                            <div class="ListingCell-shortDescription ">
            ** Strictly for Direct Buyers Only **

Welcome to San Lorenzo Village !

Developed by Ayala in 1954, San Lorenzo Village is one of the first gated residential communities in Makati City. The property is managed by the San Lorenzo Village Association and offers prospective home buyers elegant and spacious house and lots for sale. Tight security protocols are implemented to keep residents safe around the clock.

Residents can conveniently use and enjoy well-maintained village amenities, which include a swimming pool, a clubhouse, a jogging path, function rooms, and a playground. Top retail centers like Glorietta and Greenbelt and schools like Assumption College and Asian Institute of Management are just a few minutes away.             House for Sale with Pool Details:
This house for sale with pool also includes a detached apartment and a guest room.
Additional details:

  3 bedrooms
  2 living rooms
  1 dining room
  3 bathrooms with high-quality showers (made by Grohe) and wall-hung toilets; cold and hot water supply
  1 guest cr
  1 kitchen
  1 laundry/storage
  2 terraces
  1 swimming pool
  preparation for one more bedroom with private bathroom and terrace

This property is above sea level approx. 95meters.
The house is made with a lot of concrete and steel, making it highly earthquake proof. It has a very nice view of the Pacific (Cebu Strait on the East Coast).
The property has also a water connection to a private well with water softening and filtering system.

  Solar system for the hot water supply
  Double glazed windows with PVC frames, tinted windows, integrated insect nets, and electric shutters with remote control
  Modern main door (PVC, double glazed)
  Ultra-quiet split air conditioners with remote control in all bedrooms
  All floors and bathroom walls tiled with large tiles (120 * 60 cm)
  Three well-equipped bathrooms with high-quality showers (made by Grohe) and wall-hung toilets; cold and hot water supply
  Fitted kitchen with gas stove (La Germania GH830 Inox) and high quality appliances: Side-by-side fridge freezer (Samsung RS542NCAE), Oven (Franke FO4001296M XS), Microwave (Franke FMW025NHI), Extractor hood (Franke FD103A908 BK / G), Dishwasher (Bosch SMV46MX03 E); large sink (Franke Zeta ZTX 651)
  Huge main terrace (about 80 sqm) with swimming pool (about 8 * 4 * 1.5 m) and bar (about 3 * 2 m)
  Private terrace (about 9.6 sqm) in front of the guest room
  Driveway with pebbles from the stainless steel gate to the garage
  Large garage (about 29 sqm) with electric roller door (remote control)
  Terraced garden with natural stone walls and Bermuda grass
  Strong Hausmann r12000dp backup power generator

Location
Dalaguete is a place with about 67,000 inhabitants in the south of the Philippine island of Cebu. Cebu City, the second largest city in the Philippines, is approximately 90 km north and has a modern, international airport.
The house is located on a hill on the southern outskirts of the city in the district of Balud about 95 m above sea level. In the neighborhood, foreigners (German, Swiss, Australian, British) built a few houses. The access to the residential area is via a concrete road.
6022 Dalaguete, Province Cebu
Philippines
Hotel / Pension Business
With the purchase of the property, the buyer can continue to operate the Pension . Excellent reviews in all relevant internet portals confirm the quality of the house, which is well above average. Google Maps awarded the property with five stars. Guests who booked rated the property with the top grade of 10.
Investments
Fully furnished bungalow, incl. lot and garden, incl. pension business
Possible future investments: The existing infrastructure and the property offer enough space to create additional accommodations at low cost. The area could easily develop into a first class resort.
3 Bathrooms plus 2 separate toilets
Total Living Area : 251.32sqm
Total Land Size : 1,668 m²
Price 22,000,000.00

                            <h2 style="text-align:justify"><strong>Impressive Growth in the Residential Market </strong></h2>

<p><img loading="lazy"alt="House and Lot for Sale Philippines" class="loading" data-ll-status="loading" loading="lazy" src="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/static/cms/House_Buy_1.jpg" style="border:2px solid #dddddd; float:right; margin-left:10px" title="House and Lot for Sale Philippines" /></p>

<p>The Philippines is one of the fastest developing nations in Asia. For over a decade and in the next years to come, it has been and will be experiencing stellar economic growth. Due mostly to the burgeoning service industry, particularly the business process outsourcing (BPO) and information communication technology (ICT) sectors, the economic prosperity of the country has had an immensely positive effect on the real estate market.</p>

<p>It is not only the demand for office and retail markets that has increased. The residential sector has been growing as well. As an indirect result of the BPO and ICT industries’ expansion, as well as overseas remittances, the purchasing power of the people has increased. Topped off with low inflation, flexible financial options, and more affordable housing projects, Filipinos are now more than ever eager and capable to buy a <strong>house and lot for sale in the Philippines </strong>that they can call home.   </p>

<p>Although there is still a backlog in middle-income and low-cost housing amounting to an average of 58,000 units per annum, the residential real estate market remains buoyant. Government support on property investments and real estate developers has ensured that supply keeps coming in. The balance between affordability and quality in accommodations will become the priority for the next coming years.</p>

<h2 style="text-align:justify"> </h2>

<h2 style="text-align:justify"><strong>Illustrious Villages to Find a House and Lot for Sale</strong></h2>

<p>Despite the recent trend favoring condominium living, more people still prefer to purchase their very own<strong> house and lot for sale in the Philippines</strong>. There are plenty of options for a <strong>house and lot for sale in the Philippines,</strong> from Metro Manila to Cebu City. The following are the most prominent private villages or gated communities where you can find the very best<strong> house and lot for sale in the Philippines </strong>for your needs and preferences:</p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><img loading="lazy"alt="House for Sale Philippines" class="loading" data-ll-status="loading" loading="lazy" src="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/static/cms/House_Buy_2.jpg" style="border:2px solid #dddddd; float:left; margin-right:10px; margin-top:5px" title="House for Sale Philippines" /></p>

<p>These subdivisions set the norm when it comes to privacy, convenience, and comfort. Aside from 24/7 security, one cannot simply enter these villages. Your vehicle will either need a sticker that signifies you are a resident, or the guard-on-duty will call the resident you are visiting to verify whether to let you inside or not. As strict as this may seem, this does make these communities one of the safest in the country.</p>

<p>These villages also offer more than security. Each has at least one clubhouse, typically with a swimming pool where residents can hang out. There are also private parks and even golf courses. These subdivisions are also centrally located and some are even close to top educational institutions and shopping malls, making them practical locations as well.</p>

<p>It comes as no surprise why a<strong> house and for sale in the Philippines</strong> in these areas is priced at a premium. Of course, there are more affordable versions of these villages all over the country. They may not have actors, diplomats, and politicians living in them, but they offer the same basic perks for utmost comfort and security. This is why purchasing your own <strong>house and lot for sale in the Philippines</strong> is truly a dream come true.</p>

<p> </p>

<p>Yes, there are 69,662 houses and lots for sale around the Philippines. The Philippines is one of the fastest developing nations in Asia. For over a decade and in the next years to come, it has been and will be experiencing stellar economic growth.</p>

<p><strong>Are there townhouses for sale available?</strong></p>

<p>There are 30,374 <a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/house/townhouse/buy/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/house/townhouse/buy/"><strong>townhouses for sale in the Philippines</strong></a>. Whether you are situated in a busy metropolis or in the more laid-back municipalities, townhomes for sale can be found in any part of the Philippines.</p>

<p><strong>Are there beach houses for sale in the Philippines?</strong></p>

<p>Yes, there are 227 <a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/house/beach-house/buy/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/house/beach-house/buy/"><strong>beach houses for sale</strong></a> around the Philippines.
